Name: Starchild Velta and loadtosky
About the game: Velta, the star child, got their wings from the moon. But they still can't fly well. In this side-scrolling 2D action game, you'll embark on a journey of training in order to become a great star nymph. Places expand with the level of the feather! Verta can't fly well at first, but if they gets a white feather, their feather level will increase! In addition, the maximum feather level increases as the stage progresses. As you progress through the stages, the maximum feather level will increase, and with a higher feather level, exploring will be easier. A variety of actions are released one after another After defeating a boss, Velta will learn various techniques from their friends. They can fly their wings far away, call stars to create footholds... Use the techniques well to clear the stage! Crunchy enough for you? The Tower of Training .Each stage has five 'shining star fragments' scattered around the stage. When you have five of these, they become 'stars of brilliance', and if you have a star of brilliance after a certain stage, the floor corresponding to that stage will be released. If you find the normal stages too easy, try to reach the top floor! (Only for the full version) Other points .The game volume is 6 stages plus extras. It takes about 30 minutes to clear stage 1, which is the trial version. The game can be played with either a keyboard or a gamepad. （The game can be played with either a keyboard or a gamepad (the gamepad has a button layout function). There are four save files. The game will auto-save when you return to the world map. About media distribution . Media distribution is welcome, as long as it is not malicious. For more information, please refer to the 'About the secondary creation of this work' section on the website.
